# RBAC Configuration Tool - Project Instructions

## Project Overview

Full-stack RBAC (Role-Based Access Control) management tool built with Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 14 with TypeScript
- PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- JWT authentication with bcrypt
- Shadcn UI components
- Vercel deployment ready

## Features

- Custom authentication system
- Permission management (CRUD)
- Role management (CRUD)
- Role-Permission associations
- Natural language configuration (AI bonus feature)
